entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
